des: "Yams for the holidays, in a thick syrup, very sweet and delightful.  Top with a dash of cinnamon, if you like!"
ins: In a large pot over medium heat, place potatoes in water.  Top with butter and sugar, cover and bring to a boil.  Reduce heat to low and simmer, without stirring, until mixture is thick and syrupy, 40 minutes.  Mixture will thicken slightly as it cools.  Remove from heat and serve warm.
